citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 AM on 21-
June-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke with a family member. The family member stated that the
licensee was at work and no one was available to conduct the inspection at that time.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:20 AM on 21-
June-2023. The inspector knocked on the door and spoke with a family member. The family member stated that the 
licensee was at work and no one was available to conduct the inspection at that time. 
 
 
End Section
